rooms.description: Spacious Scandinavian living area with abundant natural light and open layout. Features large windows for ventilation, and a modern minimalist decor.

Cozy guest bedroom featuring built-in wardrobes, large windows to enhance natural light, and a view of the landscaped garden.
Service area including utility rooms and bathrooms for staff convenience. Ensures efficient workflow while maintaining privacy.
